20 namespace quadgrid
21 {
22 
23 /// \brief Generates a spherical quadrature grid using Gauss-Legendre quadrature in the polar direction.
24 /// \param lmax Approximate order of the grid (max degree of spherical harmonics to integrate accurately).
25 /// \param N Output number of polar grid points (will be approximately `lmax / 2`).
26 /// \param theta Output vector of polar angles \( \theta \in [0, \pi] \) (length N).
27 /// \param w_theta Output vector of associated polar weights (length N). Azimuthal weights are folded into w_theta.
28 /// \param phi Output vector of azimuthal angles \( \phi \in [0, 2\pi] \) (length 2Ã—N).
29 /// \return `true` on success; `false` if `lmax` is out of bounds (e.g., too large or unsupported).
30 /// \note This grid uses Gauss-Legendre sampling in the polar direction and uniform sampling in the azimuthal direction.
31 /// \note `lmax` should not exceed 2000 for accurate results.
32 bool unitSphereGaussLegendre(const size_t lmax,
33  size_t& N,
34  std::vector<double>& theta,
35  std::vector<double>& w_theta,
36  std::vector<double>& phi);
37 
38 } // namespace quadgrid
